data.title: 1461) » Rois Europe » Genealogy Online
data.meta_description: Charles VII de France was born on February 22, 1403 in Paris, 75056, France, son of Charles VI de France and Isabeau de Bavière. He was married on June  2, 1422 in Tours, 37261, France to Marie d'Anjou, they had 13 children., they gave birth to 1 child. He died on July 22, 1461 in Mehun-sur-Yèvre, 18141, France. This information is part of Rois Europe by Michel Schmiliver on Genealogy Online.
